short_summary: Monochrome Multi-Function Printers for National Defence
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement to purchase 500 printers with the option to purchase an additional 500 units over 2 years. This Contract is for the supply and delivery of the equipment.
duration_in_months: There is no information on a specific duration for this contract to complete.
full_summary:
2BP3-160421

**Monochrome Multi-Function Printers for the Department of National Defence**: **Solicitation Number:** BPM020993/25830 **Description:** The Department of National Defence is seeking a vendor to supply and deliver 500 monochrome multi-function printers with the option to purchase an additional 500 units over a period of 2 years. This contract is for the supply, delivery, and installation of the equipment. **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada (SSC) Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada **Contact Information:** Jesse Squirrell, Contracting Authority Email: None Phone: (613) 791-6257 Fax: (000) - (000) - 0000 **Notice Details:** * Amendment Number: 2 * Amendment Date: 2024-03-08 * Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-19 14:00:00 * Tender Status: Exired * Publication Date: 2024-02-27 * Original Solicitation: BPM020993/25830 **Goods and Services:** * GSIN: JX7025AJ, *N3610C * Description: Printers, Page, Laser - Maintenance, Printing Equipment * UNSPSC: None * UNSPSC Description: None **Trade Agreements:** * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement * Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA) * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) * Atlantic Procurement Agreement **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except NCR), Ontario (except NCR), Nova Scotia, Manitoba, British Columbia **Notice Attachments:** You can find the attachments at the following URLs:
